body:
Hey everyone, i just wanted to let you all know that my 2nd episode of the Nebula series is finally upon us, despite some internet problems I've been facing :(
Also, i MAY have caught a flying hacker, so i think its worth checking it out to see if I'm going bling or something?!
Anyway, thanks for the current support guys and here's a link to the video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DRRmPk-rbPM
